entry.title: Monday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy ending before morning then clearing. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming north 30 km/h gusting to 50 this evening. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly sunny. Temperature falling to minus 5 in the afternoon.
